attributes.action: Having A Licence For A Knife/Knives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For an individual to to have the rights, to own a knife responsibily, that means having to go throught the Police to get a licence, that wll be supplied by the Police, the licence will only be for people, that do not have a criminal record and to be used for: Camping and Display uses only! The licence form should be coloured in orange! This licence form is to be renewed every six mounth, as circumstances, may chance after a period of time, if they have not changed, they you will still need to update and renew your form!
